seed_pair.target: I don't enjoy waking up when I didn't sleep very well.
seed_pair.known: No disfruto despertarme cuando no dormí muy bien.

I'm not trying to finish | I'm trying to finish | trying to finish | as quickly as possible | to finish

I enjoy doing | interesting things | with my friends

wanted to write | write a letter | a letter | to his friend | last week
S0053: quería poner | poner su carta | su carta | en su bolsa
wanted to put | put his letter | his letter | in her bag
S0054: queríamos darte | darte un poco más | un poco más de tiempo | tiempo
we wanted to give you | give you a little more | a little more time | time
